themes: accessibility and inclusion (ASL, Spanish translation, child care)
support for artists' professional needs (archival video/work samples)
key_phrases: Free/subsidized archival video/work samples for artists
Free/subsidized child care for artists in rehearsal and artists and audience during performances
Campaign to pressure wealthy citizens to give more to the arts
"do your duty to this city and give money to the arts" kind of campaign
barriers_identified: lack of affordable access to archival video/work samples
insufficient ASL and Spanish translation services
lack of affordable child care for artists and audiences
insufficient philanthropic giving from wealthy citizens
solutions_proposed: Providing free or subsidized archival video/work samples
Providing free or subsidized ASL and Spanish translation
Providing free or subsidized child care for artists and audiences
Launching a campaign to pressure wealthy citizens to give more to the arts
